amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $100 million from the International Space Station account to the Aeronautical Research and Technology account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Aeronautical Research and Technology funding by $100 million and decrease International Space Station funding accordingly.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bateman amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 286 (Roll no. 138).
